title: Ok...champions are getting outdated...great....
body:
ugh riot...you just dont care about howw nautilus looks and plays annnd hoow yorick is so lonely and sad out there without a life...but still you dont give a crap about them, and im asking/begging for you to turn your attention to these lonely OUTDATED champions and fix them.please make a difference by upgrading nautilus and yourick and everyone else instead of wasting time on summoners rift,new champs,etc and just sort of update the old champs that people love,like i love nautilus and worked so hard for him even tho his visuals are well...a little displeasing.so please riot be that one game that still cares about the old school characters.
Thanks and Merry Christmas! #{{champion:266}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:268}}  My fav champs :3 upgrade them is what IM asking,although i know people want more.

replies.body: Wait, is he saying Azir is outdated?

champions aren't outdated. and the ones that are looking a little shabby because of recent additions are in the works. riot like money, trust. they will want to sell unpopular champs again someday. thy probably have plans. trust our overlords.
Also, that is not how things work. They have teams working on different things i.e the same people updating summoners rift is most likely not the same people who were working on the new SR.

...the people updating SR...arent the people updating SR....wow you are so smart.

the new SR is basically finished and wont change anymore in terms of visuals.

Sounds like a.... "I like these champions ... please buff them" thread...
For Christs sake there are champions in that list are brand new or recently reworked... =/

So you're just ignoring every rework Riot announced the past year eh?

Yorick is coming.
Nautilous is already in the works in terms of VU. Hes gonna be the size of Sion i believe and retextured. Give it time
